Quotes.author: Henry Ford
Quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.

Quotes.author: Winston Churchill
Quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
Quotes.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.

Quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quotes.quote: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.

Quotes.author: Jim Rohn
Quotes.quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.

Quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quotes.quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.

Quotes.author: Godfrey Winn
Quotes.quote: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.

Quotes.author: George S. Patton
Quotes.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.

Quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe
Quotes.quote: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.

Quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
Quotes.quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.

Quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
Quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.

Quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer
Quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

Quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda
Quotes.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.

Quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
Quotes.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.

Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
Quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing.

Quotes.author: David Frost
Quotes.quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.

Quotes.author: David Brinkley
Quotes.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.

Quotes.author: Booker T. Washington
Quotes.quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

Quotes.author: Michael Jordan
Quotes.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

Quotes.author: Bruce Lee
Quotes.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.

Quotes.author: Winston Churchill
Quotes.quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

Quotes.author: Mario Andretti
Quotes.quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.

Quotes.author: Bill Gates
Quotes.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.

Quotes.author: Mark Twain
Quotes.quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
